tess.automations package¶

Submodules¶

tess.automations.tess_controller module¶

class tess.automations.tess_controller.TESSController(rule_config_file)[source]¶

Bases: tess.automations.TESSAutomation

Baseclass for all TESS Controllers. Control and automate the start thermostat for the fan operation.

Must be run as a service class.

run()[source]¶
  1. Schedule conditions in random.
start()[source]¶
  1. Choose a random condition and submit it to executor to run it now.

tess.automations.tess_monitor module¶

class tess.automations.tess_monitor.TESSMonitor(rule_config_file)[source]¶

Bases: tess.automations.TESSAutomation

Baseclass for all TESS Monitors. Monitor the smart thermostat state especially fan mode.

Run monitoring service continuously

run()[source]¶

Run the monitoring now
